A theta of 0.60 balances the need for food with the risk of overexertion.

By raising my hunting intensity, I can better secure my share of the dwindling sheep population, especially since their numbers have decreased. A higher theta will help me adapt to the current situation and ensure my survival.

With more wolves around, a lower intensity will help conserve energy and reduce competition for the remaining sheep. This way, I can still hunt effectively without overexerting myself in a challenging environment.

A moderate intensity allows me to conserve energy while still contributing to the pack's survival.
